question: Are you already registered with OAED?
Do you have an account in the OAED system (electronic identification)?
Do you have the necessary documents with you? (e.g. identity card, proof of address, VAT number)
Do you meet the following criteria: You are not working, you are not a student and you have no income?
Will you fill out the form yourself or do you need help?
Do you want to receive your unemployment card online or in person?
